Product1.Name: Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with Lid, 45-L, Black/Blue
Product1.ShortDescription: Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with Lid, 45-L, Black/Blue
Product1.Description: Get organized easily with the ample space in this Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box. The sturdy plastic construction protects contents and features a recessed lid so you can securely stack the boxes and cover all your storage needs. It has ergonomic handles for easy carrying, and this versatile black and blue storage box features built-in holes for adding ties or a lock for extra security.

Specifications.Label: Advanced Features
Specifications.Value: Made in Canada, Nestable, Stackable, Reusable

Features: Features a recessed lid with keyholes to accommodate locks and cable ties
Ideal for workshop, garage, and household use
Available in larger sizes (each sold separately): 70 L (CT# 142-2822) and 102 L (CT# 142-6045)

Examples.Title: Sturdy, stackable storage box.
Examples.Text:
Box is sturdy, the lid snaps on and off as it should. Can only use inside or protected areas as the lid collects water, but does not leak. They also stack well.
Very pleased with it, good quality and good price. Would buy again.

Examples.Title: Totes
Examples.Text: Love these totes using outside for assorted items

Examples.Title: Label Your Boxes
Examples.Text: I would have to say the only place my purchase of two of these lovely boxes fell down was in my failure to label them on a week-long camping excursion. Solid storage boxes that they are, one was to be for the protection of dry food goods, the other a handy portable toilet. Owing to low light conditions at the camp and complete failure to label the containers, this plan went bad on day two and sadly never recovered. The result, a hungry, shortened visit to the wilderness and some seriously grumpy fellow campers. The only fault to these boxes was again, human error. Good product otherwise.

Product2.Name: Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with Lid, 102-L, Black/Blue
Product2.ShortDescription: Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with Lid, 102-L, Black/Blue
Product2.Description: The Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with Lid is ready to tackle any task. Whether you need extra storage in the garage, a rugged box for tools in the workshop, or weather-resistant storage for gear in the truck bed, this storage box accommodates it all. This heavy-duty container features an easy-locking lid with holes for padlocks or zip ties to keep your cargo protected from the elements on even the hardest jobs. This stackable box maximizes your cargo space when transporting supplies to the job site or organizing your workshop.

Specifications.Label: Advanced Features
Specifications.Value: Made in Canada, Nestable, Reusable, Stackable

Features: Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with a snap-lock lid
Stacks and nests together, and with the 70L Heavy Duty Storage Box (SKU #142-2822-4)
Size: 29 x 20 x 16 inches (74 x 51 x 41cm)

Examples.Title: We could not be more pleased...
Examples.Text: We bought these totes on sale, just in time to pack for our move.  We could not be more pleased with how heavy-duty, easy to carry and sturdily stackable they are compared to others we have purchased in the past!  They will be perfect  for long-term shed/barn storage after we have moved as well!

Examples.Title: Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with Lid 102 -L
Examples.Text: I love these stackable storage boxes! Makes storage so easy and tidy!

Examples.Title: Great tote and the price was amazing. I wish I had bought more
Examples.Text: Mastercraft Heavy Duty tote

Examples.Title: I love these - great for moving!
Examples.Text: These are great! Incredibly sturdy and they stack well. They hold a surprising amount of stuff and are great for moving. The lids snap on tight, and they can also be secured with nylon ties (sold separately).

Examples.Title: Great quality for a good price
Examples.Text: Sturdy with a lid that snaps on nicely.

Examples.Title: Appreciate the product
Examples.Text: Really good quality very tough

Examples.Title: Just what I needed!
Examples.Text: Great quality and size!

Examples.Title: Very good quality üëå
Examples.Text: Very good quality üëå

Examples.Title: A true investment
Examples.Text: Great size options.  Extremely well made, stack great or slide easily into a tote storage system.  I use a white paint pen on the side to indicate what‚Äôs inside.  Best investment to have all totes the same.  They go on sale often enough that you can but in batches.

Examples.Title: Great box but incorrect dimensions in description
Examples.Text:
Bought this tote to house a scientific tool with specified dimensions. Although I expected the stated dimensions to be the outside of the tote, they weren't even close to the actual item. Even the largest part of the tote (which is the lid) wasn't even 29" x 20" so I'm assuming they rounded up the dimensions of the lid... which is a little deceiving.
The tote is very well built and a good value so I'll probably keep it for household items but I was disappointed with the false advertising.

Examples.Title: Lids have changed and stack different with old ones. Still great but something to know!
Examples.Text:
We bought about 8 of these totes about 3 years ago and love them!! We just bought 6 more only to find out that the lids have changed!! The old lids have a diamond pattern and the new ones have a square pattern. 
Was a little disappointed but we were able to make it work. You can not stack the new totes on the old lids but you can stack the new totes on the old lids.  They don‚Äôt really ‚Äúlock‚Äù into place either. For us it wasn‚Äôt the end of the world as olds and new have their own stack.

Examples.Title: Big price tag same low quality.
Examples.Text: Purchased using the curb side pick up, I was provided with broken products.

Examples.Title: Meh!
Examples.Text: Lids break way too easily! I will come back to this product if they reinforce the lid.

Examples.Title: to fragile
Examples.Text: they break too easy.  too expensive (pricy) for the  quality.

Summary: Mastercraft Heavy Duty Stackable Storage Box with Lid, 102-L, Black/Blue
Features an easy-locking lid with holes for padlocks or zip ties
Can be used for general purpose storage

KeyDifferences: Product 1 has a capacity of 45L, while Product 2 has a capacity of 102L
Product 2 is constructed from heavy-duty polypropylene, Product 1 is made from plastic
Product 2 can hold up to 400lbs (181.4kg). Product 1 doesn't mention any maximum load capacity.
Product 2 is larger in all dimensions (height, depth, width) than Product 1.
